welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Grossburgwedel, a charming city known for its picturesque scenery and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Finkenwerder Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Finkenwerder Airport, primarily used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic and Schengen flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international and non-Schengen flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, no password required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hildesheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights and private charters.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
